00078 /* All support for plugin textures: */
00079 int test_dlerr(const char *name, const char *symbol)
00080 {
00081     char *err;
00082     
00083     err= BLI_dynlib_get_error_as_string(NULL);
00084     if (err) {
00085         printf("var1: %s, var2: %s, var3: %s\n", name, symbol, err);
00086         return 1;
00087     }
00088     
00089     return 0;
00090 }

00092 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00093 
00094 void open_plugin_tex(PluginTex *pit)
00095 {
00096     int (*version)(void);
00097     
00098     /* init all the happy variables */
00099     pit->doit= NULL;
00100     pit->pname= NULL;
00101     pit->stnames= NULL;
00102     pit->varstr= NULL;
00103     pit->result= NULL;
00104     pit->cfra= NULL;
00105     pit->version= 0;
00106     pit->instance_init= NULL;
00107     
00108     /* clear the error list */
00109     BLI_dynlib_get_error_as_string(NULL);
00110 
00111     /* no BLI_dynlib_close! multiple opened plugins... */
00112     /* if (pit->handle) BLI_dynlib_close(pit->handle); */
00113     /* pit->handle= 0; */
00114 
00115     /* open the needed object */
00116     pit->handle= BLI_dynlib_open(pit->name);
00117     if (test_dlerr(pit->name, pit->name)) return;
00118 
00119     if (pit->handle != NULL) {
00120         /* find the address of the version function */
00121         version= (int (*)(void)) BLI_dynlib_find_symbol(pit->handle, "plugin_tex_getversion");
00122         if (test_dlerr(pit->name, "plugin_tex_getversion")) return;
00123         
00124         if (version != NULL) {
00125             pit->version= version();
00126             if ( pit->version >= 2 && pit->version <=6) {
00127                 int (*info_func)(PluginInfo *);
00128                 PluginInfo *info= (PluginInfo*) MEM_mallocN(sizeof(PluginInfo), "plugin_info"); 
00129 
00130                 info_func= (int (*)(PluginInfo *))BLI_dynlib_find_symbol(pit->handle, "plugin_getinfo");
00131                 if (!test_dlerr(pit->name, "plugin_getinfo")) {
00132                     info->instance_init = NULL;
00133 
00134                     info_func(info);
00135 
00136                     pit->doit= (int(*)(void)) info->tex_doit;
00137                     pit->callback= (void(*)(unsigned short)) info->callback;
00138                     pit->stypes= info->stypes;
00139                     pit->vars= info->nvars;
00140                     pit->pname= info->name;
00141                     pit->stnames= info->snames;
00142                     pit->varstr= info->varstr;
00143                     pit->result= info->result;
00144                     pit->cfra= info->cfra;
00145                     pit->instance_init = info->instance_init;
00146                     if (info->init) info->init();
00147                 }
00148                 MEM_freeN(info);
00149             }
00150             else {
00151                 printf ("Plugin returned unrecognized version number\n");
00152                 return;
00153             }
00154         }
00155     }
00156 }

00158 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

00160 /* very badlevel define to bypass linking with BIF_interface.h */
00161 #define INT 96
00162 #define FLO 128
00163 
00164 PluginTex *add_plugin_tex(char *str)
00165 {
00166     PluginTex *pit;
00167     VarStruct *varstr;
00168     int a;
00169     
00170     pit= MEM_callocN(sizeof(PluginTex), "plugintex");
00171     
00172     BLI_strncpy(pit->name, str, sizeof(pit->name));
00173     open_plugin_tex(pit);
00174     
00175     if (pit->doit==NULL) {
00176         if (pit->handle==NULL) {;} //XXX error("no plugin: %s", str);
00177         else {;} //XXX error("in plugin: %s", str);
00178         MEM_freeN(pit);
00179         return NULL;
00180     }
00181     
00182     varstr= pit->varstr;
00183     for (a=0; a<pit->vars; a++, varstr++) {
00184         if ( (varstr->type & FLO)==FLO)
00185             pit->data[a]= varstr->def;
00186         else if ( (varstr->type & INT)==INT)
00187             *((int *)(pit->data+a))= (int) varstr->def;
00188     }
00189 
00190     if (pit->instance_init)
00191         pit->instance_init((void *) pit->data);
00192 
00193     return pit;
00194 }
00195 
00196 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00197 
00198 void free_plugin_tex(PluginTex *pit)
00199 {
00200     if (pit==NULL) return;
00201         
00202     /* no BLI_dynlib_close: same plugin can be opened multiple times, 1 handle */
00203     MEM_freeN(pit); 
00204 }

00208 TexMapping *add_tex_mapping(void)
00209 {
00210     TexMapping *texmap= MEM_callocN(sizeof(TexMapping), "TexMapping");
00211     
00212     default_tex_mapping(texmap);
00213     
00214     return texmap;
00215 }
00216 
00217 void default_tex_mapping(TexMapping *texmap)
00218 {
00219     memset(texmap, 0, sizeof(TexMapping));
00220 
00221     texmap->size[0]= texmap->size[1]= texmap->size[2]= 1.0f;
00222     texmap->max[0]= texmap->max[1]= texmap->max[2]= 1.0f;
00223     unit_m4(texmap->mat);
00224 
00225     texmap->projx= PROJ_X;
00226     texmap->projy= PROJ_Y;
00227     texmap->projz= PROJ_Z;
00228     texmap->mapping= MTEX_FLAT;
00229 }
00230 
00231 void init_tex_mapping(TexMapping *texmap)
00232 {
00233     float smat[3][3], rmat[3][3], mat[3][3], proj[3][3];
00234 
00235     if (texmap->projx == PROJ_X && texmap->projy == PROJ_Y && texmap->projz == PROJ_Z &&
00236        is_zero_v3(texmap->loc) && is_zero_v3(texmap->rot) && is_one_v3(texmap->size)) {
00237         unit_m4(texmap->mat);
00238 
00239         texmap->flag |= TEXMAP_UNIT_MATRIX;
00240     }
00241     else {
00242         /* axis projection */
00243         zero_m3(proj);
00244 
00245         if (texmap->projx != PROJ_N)
00246             proj[texmap->projx-1][0]= 1.0f;
00247         if (texmap->projy != PROJ_N)
00248             proj[texmap->projy-1][1]= 1.0f;
00249         if (texmap->projz != PROJ_N)
00250             proj[texmap->projz-1][2]= 1.0f;
00251 
00252         /* scale */
00253         size_to_mat3(smat, texmap->size);
00254         
00255         /* rotation */
00256         /* TexMapping rotation are now in radians. */
00257         eul_to_mat3(rmat, texmap->rot);
00258         
00259         /* compose it all */
00260         mul_m3_m3m3(mat, rmat, smat);
00261         mul_m3_m3m3(mat, proj, mat);
00262         
00263         /* translation */
00264         copy_m4_m3(texmap->mat, mat);
00265         copy_v3_v3(texmap->mat[3], texmap->loc);
00266 
00267         texmap->flag &= ~TEXMAP_UNIT_MATRIX;
00268     }
00269 }

00279 
00280 void default_color_mapping(ColorMapping *colormap)
00281 {
00282     memset(colormap, 0, sizeof(ColorMapping));
00283 
00284     init_colorband(&colormap->coba, 1);
00285 
00286     colormap->bright= 1.0;
00287     colormap->contrast= 1.0;
00288     colormap->saturation= 1.0;
00289 
00290     colormap->blend_color[0]= 0.8f;
00291     colormap->blend_color[1]= 0.8f;
00292     colormap->blend_color[2]= 0.8f;
00293     colormap->blend_type= MA_RAMP_BLEND;
00294     colormap->blend_factor= 0.0f;
00295 }

00297 /* ****************** COLORBAND ******************* */
00298 
00299 void init_colorband(ColorBand *coba, int rangetype)
00300 {
00301     int a;
00302     
00303     coba->data[0].pos= 0.0;
00304     coba->data[1].pos= 1.0;
00305     
00306     if (rangetype==0) {
00307         coba->data[0].r= 0.0;
00308         coba->data[0].g= 0.0;
00309         coba->data[0].b= 0.0;
00310         coba->data[0].a= 0.0;
00311         
00312         coba->data[1].r= 1.0;
00313         coba->data[1].g= 1.0;
00314         coba->data[1].b= 1.0;
00315         coba->data[1].a= 1.0;
00316     }
00317     else {
00318         coba->data[0].r= 0.0;
00319         coba->data[0].g= 0.0;
00320         coba->data[0].b= 0.0;
00321         coba->data[0].a= 1.0;
00322         
00323         coba->data[1].r= 1.0;
00324         coba->data[1].g= 1.0;
00325         coba->data[1].b= 1.0;
00326         coba->data[1].a= 1.0;
00327     }
00328     
00329     for (a=2; a<MAXCOLORBAND; a++) {
00330         coba->data[a].r= 0.5;
00331         coba->data[a].g= 0.5;
00332         coba->data[a].b= 0.5;
00333         coba->data[a].a= 1.0;
00334         coba->data[a].pos= 0.5;
00335     }
00336     
00337     coba->tot= 2;
00338     
00339 }
00340 
00341 ColorBand *add_colorband(int rangetype)
00342 {
00343     ColorBand *coba;
00344     
00345     coba= MEM_callocN( sizeof(ColorBand), "colorband");
00346     init_colorband(coba, rangetype);
00347     
00348     return coba;
00349 }
00350 
00351 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00352 
00353 int do_colorband(const ColorBand *coba, float in, float out[4])
00354 {
00355     const CBData *cbd1, *cbd2, *cbd0, *cbd3;
00356     float fac, mfac, t[4];
00357     int a;
00358     
00359     if (coba==NULL || coba->tot==0) return 0;
00360     
00361     cbd1= coba->data;
00362     if (coba->tot==1) {
00363         out[0]= cbd1->r;
00364         out[1]= cbd1->g;
00365         out[2]= cbd1->b;
00366         out[3]= cbd1->a;
00367     }
00368     else {
00369         if (in <= cbd1->pos && coba->ipotype<2) {
00370             out[0]= cbd1->r;
00371             out[1]= cbd1->g;
00372             out[2]= cbd1->b;
00373             out[3]= cbd1->a;
00374         }
00375         else {
00376             CBData left, right;
00377             
00378             /* we're looking for first pos > in */
00379             for (a=0; a<coba->tot; a++, cbd1++) if (cbd1->pos > in) break;
00380                 
00381             if (a==coba->tot) {
00382                 cbd2= cbd1-1;
00383                 right= *cbd2;
00384                 right.pos= 1.0f;
00385                 cbd1= &right;
00386             }
00387             else if (a==0) {
00388                 left= *cbd1;
00389                 left.pos= 0.0f;
00390                 cbd2= &left;
00391             }
00392             else cbd2= cbd1-1;
00393             
00394             if (in >= cbd1->pos && coba->ipotype<2) {
00395                 out[0]= cbd1->r;
00396                 out[1]= cbd1->g;
00397                 out[2]= cbd1->b;
00398                 out[3]= cbd1->a;
00399             }
00400             else {
00401         
00402                 if (cbd2->pos!=cbd1->pos)
00403                     fac= (in-cbd1->pos)/(cbd2->pos-cbd1->pos);
00404                 else {
00405                     /* was setting to 0.0 in 2.56 & previous, but this
00406                      * is incorrect for the last element, see [#26732] */
00407                     fac= (a != coba->tot) ? 0.0f : 1.0f;
00408                 }
00409                 
00410                 if (coba->ipotype==4) {
00411                     /* constant */
00412                     out[0]= cbd2->r;
00413                     out[1]= cbd2->g;
00414                     out[2]= cbd2->b;
00415                     out[3]= cbd2->a;
00416                     return 1;
00417                 }
00418                 
00419                 if (coba->ipotype>=2) {
00420                     /* ipo from right to left: 3 2 1 0 */
00421                     
00422                     if (a>=coba->tot-1) cbd0= cbd1;
00423                     else cbd0= cbd1+1;
00424                     if (a<2) cbd3= cbd2;
00425                     else cbd3= cbd2-1;
00426                     
00427                     CLAMP(fac, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00428                     
00429                     if (coba->ipotype==3)
00430                         key_curve_position_weights(fac, t, KEY_CARDINAL);
00431                     else
00432                         key_curve_position_weights(fac, t, KEY_BSPLINE);
00433 
00434                     out[0]= t[3]*cbd3->r +t[2]*cbd2->r +t[1]*cbd1->r +t[0]*cbd0->r;
00435                     out[1]= t[3]*cbd3->g +t[2]*cbd2->g +t[1]*cbd1->g +t[0]*cbd0->g;
00436                     out[2]= t[3]*cbd3->b +t[2]*cbd2->b +t[1]*cbd1->b +t[0]*cbd0->b;
00437                     out[3]= t[3]*cbd3->a +t[2]*cbd2->a +t[1]*cbd1->a +t[0]*cbd0->a;
00438                     CLAMP(out[0], 0.0f, 1.0f);
00439                     CLAMP(out[1], 0.0f, 1.0f);
00440                     CLAMP(out[2], 0.0f, 1.0f);
00441                     CLAMP(out[3], 0.0f, 1.0f);
00442                 }
00443                 else {
00444                 
00445                     if (coba->ipotype==1) { /* EASE */
00446                         mfac= fac*fac;
00447                         fac= 3.0f*mfac-2.0f*mfac*fac;
00448                     }
00449                     mfac= 1.0f-fac;
00450                     
00451                     out[0]= mfac*cbd1->r + fac*cbd2->r;
00452                     out[1]= mfac*cbd1->g + fac*cbd2->g;
00453                     out[2]= mfac*cbd1->b + fac*cbd2->b;
00454                     out[3]= mfac*cbd1->a + fac*cbd2->a;
00455                 }
00456             }
00457         }
00458     }
00459     return 1;   /* OK */
00460 }
00461 
00462 void colorband_table_RGBA(ColorBand *coba, float **array, int *size)
00463 {
00464     int a;
00465     
00466     *size = CM_TABLE+1;
00467     *array = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float)*(*size)*4, "ColorBand");
00468 
00469     for (a=0; a<*size; a++)
00470         do_colorband(coba, (float)a/(float)CM_TABLE, &(*array)[a*4]);
00471 }
00472 
00473 int vergcband(const void *a1, const void *a2)
00474 {
00475     const CBData *x1=a1, *x2=a2;
00476 
00477     if ( x1->pos > x2->pos ) return 1;
00478     else if ( x1->pos < x2->pos) return -1;
00479     return 0;
00480 }
00481 
00482 void colorband_update_sort(ColorBand *coba)
00483 {
00484     int a;
00485     
00486     if (coba->tot<2)
00487         return;
00488     
00489     for (a=0; a<coba->tot; a++)
00490         coba->data[a].cur= a;
00491 
00492     qsort(coba->data, coba->tot, sizeof(CBData), vergcband);
00493 
00494     for (a=0; a<coba->tot; a++) {
00495         if (coba->data[a].cur==coba->cur) {
00496             coba->cur= a;
00497             break;
00498         }
00499     }
00500 }
00501 
00502 CBData *colorband_element_add(struct ColorBand *coba, float position)
00503 {
00504     if (coba->tot==MAXCOLORBAND) {
00505         return NULL;
00506     }
00507     else if (coba->tot > 0) {
00508         CBData *xnew;
00509         float col[4];
00510 
00511         do_colorband(coba, position, col);
00512 
00513         xnew = &coba->data[coba->tot];
00514         xnew->pos = position;
00515 
00516         xnew->r = col[0];
00517         xnew->g = col[1];
00518         xnew->b = col[2];
00519         xnew->a = col[3];
00520     }
00521 
00522     coba->tot++;
00523     coba->cur = coba->tot-1;
00524 
00525     colorband_update_sort(coba);
00526 
00527     return coba->data + coba->cur;
00528 }
00529 
00530 int colorband_element_remove(struct ColorBand *coba, int index)
00531 {
00532     int a;
00533 
00534     if (coba->tot < 2)
00535         return 0;
00536 
00537     if (index < 0 || index >= coba->tot)
00538         return 0;
00539 
00540     for (a = index; a < coba->tot; a++) {
00541         coba->data[a] = coba->data[a + 1];
00542     }
00543     if (coba->cur) coba->cur--;
00544     coba->tot--;
00545     return 1;
00546 }
00547 
00548 /* ******************* TEX ************************ */
00549 
00550 void free_texture(Tex *tex)
00551 {
00552     free_plugin_tex(tex->plugin);
00553     
00554     if (tex->coba) MEM_freeN(tex->coba);
00555     if (tex->env) BKE_free_envmap(tex->env);
00556     if (tex->pd) BKE_free_pointdensity(tex->pd);
00557     if (tex->vd) BKE_free_voxeldata(tex->vd);
00558     if (tex->ot) BKE_free_oceantex(tex->ot);
00559     BKE_free_animdata((struct ID *)tex);
00560     
00561     BKE_previewimg_free(&tex->preview);
00562     BKE_icon_delete((struct ID*)tex);
00563     tex->id.icon_id = 0;
00564     
00565     if (tex->nodetree) {
00566         ntreeFreeTree(tex->nodetree);
00567         MEM_freeN(tex->nodetree);
00568     }
00569 }

00571 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00572 
00573 void default_tex(Tex *tex)
00574 {
00575     PluginTex *pit;
00576     VarStruct *varstr;
00577     int a;
00578 
00579     tex->type= TEX_CLOUDS;
00580     tex->stype= 0;
00581     tex->flag= TEX_CHECKER_ODD;
00582     tex->imaflag= TEX_INTERPOL|TEX_MIPMAP|TEX_USEALPHA;
00583     tex->extend= TEX_REPEAT;
00584     tex->cropxmin= tex->cropymin= 0.0;
00585     tex->cropxmax= tex->cropymax= 1.0;
00586     tex->texfilter = TXF_EWA;
00587     tex->afmax = 8;
00588     tex->xrepeat= tex->yrepeat= 1;
00589     tex->fie_ima= 2;
00590     tex->sfra= 1;
00591     tex->frames= 0;
00592     tex->offset= 0;
00593     tex->noisesize= 0.25;
00594     tex->noisedepth= 2;
00595     tex->turbul= 5.0;
00596     tex->nabla= 0.025;  // also in do_versions
00597     tex->bright= 1.0;
00598     tex->contrast= 1.0;
00599     tex->saturation= 1.0;
00600     tex->filtersize= 1.0;
00601     tex->rfac= 1.0;
00602     tex->gfac= 1.0;
00603     tex->bfac= 1.0;
00604     /* newnoise: init. */
00605     tex->noisebasis = 0;
00606     tex->noisebasis2 = 0;
00607     /* musgrave */
00608     tex->mg_H = 1.0;
00609     tex->mg_lacunarity = 2.0;
00610     tex->mg_octaves = 2.0;
00611     tex->mg_offset = 1.0;
00612     tex->mg_gain = 1.0;
00613     tex->ns_outscale = 1.0;
00614     /* distnoise */
00615     tex->dist_amount = 1.0;
00616     /* voronoi */
00617     tex->vn_w1 = 1.0;
00618     tex->vn_w2 = tex->vn_w3 = tex->vn_w4 = 0.0;
00619     tex->vn_mexp = 2.5;
00620     tex->vn_distm = 0;
00621     tex->vn_coltype = 0;
00622 
00623     if (tex->env) {
00624         tex->env->stype=ENV_ANIM;
00625         tex->env->clipsta=0.1;
00626         tex->env->clipend=100;
00627         tex->env->cuberes=600;
00628         tex->env->depth=0;
00629     }
00630 
00631     if (tex->pd) {
00632         tex->pd->radius = 0.3f;
00633         tex->pd->falloff_type = TEX_PD_FALLOFF_STD;
00634     }
00635     
00636     if (tex->vd) {
00637         tex->vd->resol[0] = tex->vd->resol[1] = tex->vd->resol[2] = 0;
00638         tex->vd->interp_type=TEX_VD_LINEAR;
00639         tex->vd->file_format=TEX_VD_SMOKE;
00640     }
00641     
00642     if (tex->ot) {
00643         tex->ot->output = TEX_OCN_DISPLACEMENT;
00644         tex->ot->object = NULL;
00645     }
00646     pit = tex->plugin;
00647     if (pit) {
00648         varstr= pit->varstr;
00649         if (varstr) {
00650             for (a=0; a<pit->vars; a++, varstr++) {
00651                 pit->data[a] = varstr->def;
00652             }
00653         }
00654     }
00655     
00656     tex->iuser.fie_ima= 2;
00657     tex->iuser.ok= 1;
00658     tex->iuser.frames= 100;
00659     tex->iuser.sfra= 1;
00660     
00661     tex->preview = NULL;
00662 }
00663 
00664 void tex_set_type(Tex *tex, int type)
00665 {
00666     switch(type) {
00667             
00668         case TEX_VOXELDATA:
00669             if (tex->vd == NULL)
00670                 tex->vd = BKE_add_voxeldata();
00671             break;
00672         case TEX_POINTDENSITY:
00673             if (tex->pd == NULL)
00674                 tex->pd = BKE_add_pointdensity();
00675             break;
00676         case TEX_ENVMAP:
00677             if (tex->env == NULL)
00678                 tex->env = BKE_add_envmap();
00679             break;
00680         case TEX_OCEAN:
00681             if (tex->ot == NULL)
00682                 tex->ot = BKE_add_oceantex();
00683             break;
00684     }
00685     
00686     tex->type = type;
00687 }
00688 
00689 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00690 
00691 Tex *add_texture(const char *name)
00692 {
00693     Main *bmain= G.main;
00694     Tex *tex;
00695 
00696     tex= alloc_libblock(&bmain->tex, ID_TE, name);
00697     
00698     default_tex(tex);
00699     
00700     return tex;
00701 }
00702 
00703 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00704 
00705 void default_mtex(MTex *mtex)
00706 {
00707     mtex->texco= TEXCO_ORCO;
00708     mtex->mapto= MAP_COL;
00709     mtex->object= NULL;
00710     mtex->projx= PROJ_X;
00711     mtex->projy= PROJ_Y;
00712     mtex->projz= PROJ_Z;
00713     mtex->mapping= MTEX_FLAT;
00714     mtex->ofs[0]= 0.0;
00715     mtex->ofs[1]= 0.0;
00716     mtex->ofs[2]= 0.0;
00717     mtex->size[0]= 1.0;
00718     mtex->size[1]= 1.0;
00719     mtex->size[2]= 1.0;
00720     mtex->tex= NULL;
00721     mtex->texflag= MTEX_3TAP_BUMP | MTEX_BUMP_OBJECTSPACE;
00722     mtex->colormodel= 0;
00723     mtex->r= 1.0;
00724     mtex->g= 0.0;
00725     mtex->b= 1.0;
00726     mtex->k= 1.0;
00727     mtex->def_var= 1.0;
00728     mtex->blendtype= MTEX_BLEND;
00729     mtex->colfac= 1.0;
00730     mtex->norfac= 1.0;
00731     mtex->varfac= 1.0;
00732     mtex->dispfac=0.2;
00733     mtex->colspecfac= 1.0f;
00734     mtex->mirrfac= 1.0f;
00735     mtex->alphafac= 1.0f;
00736     mtex->difffac= 1.0f;
00737     mtex->specfac= 1.0f;
00738     mtex->emitfac= 1.0f;
00739     mtex->hardfac= 1.0f;
00740     mtex->raymirrfac= 1.0f;
00741     mtex->translfac= 1.0f;
00742     mtex->ambfac= 1.0f;
00743     mtex->colemitfac= 1.0f;
00744     mtex->colreflfac= 1.0f;
00745     mtex->coltransfac= 1.0f;
00746     mtex->densfac= 1.0f;
00747     mtex->scatterfac= 1.0f;
00748     mtex->reflfac= 1.0f;
00749     mtex->shadowfac= 1.0f;
00750     mtex->zenupfac= 1.0f;
00751     mtex->zendownfac= 1.0f;
00752     mtex->blendfac= 1.0f;
00753     mtex->timefac= 1.0f;
00754     mtex->lengthfac= 1.0f;
00755     mtex->clumpfac= 1.0f;
00756     mtex->kinkfac= 1.0f;
00757     mtex->roughfac= 1.0f;
00758     mtex->padensfac= 1.0f;
00759     mtex->lifefac= 1.0f;
00760     mtex->sizefac= 1.0f;
00761     mtex->ivelfac= 1.0f;
00762     mtex->dampfac= 1.0f;
00763     mtex->gravityfac= 1.0f;
00764     mtex->fieldfac= 1.0f;
00765     mtex->normapspace= MTEX_NSPACE_TANGENT;
00766 }
00767 
00768 
00769 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00770 
00771 MTex *add_mtex(void)
00772 {
00773     MTex *mtex;
00774     
00775     mtex= MEM_callocN(sizeof(MTex), "add_mtex");
00776     
00777     default_mtex(mtex);
00778     
00779     return mtex;
00780 }
00781 
00782 /* slot -1 for first free ID */
00783 MTex *add_mtex_id(ID *id, int slot)
00784 {
00785     MTex **mtex_ar;
00786     short act;
00787 
00788     give_active_mtex(id, &mtex_ar, &act);
00789 
00790     if (mtex_ar==NULL) {
00791         return NULL;
00792     }
00793     
00794     if (slot==-1) {
00795         /* find first free */
00796         int i;      
00797         for (i= 0; i < MAX_MTEX; i++) {
00798             if (!mtex_ar[i]) {
00799                 slot= i;
00800                 break;
00801             }
00802         }
00803         if (slot == -1) {
00804             return NULL;
00805         }
00806     }
00807     else {
00808         /* make sure slot is valid */
00809         if (slot < 0 || slot >= MAX_MTEX) {
00810             return NULL;
00811         }
00812     }
00813 
00814     if (mtex_ar[slot]) {
00815         id_us_min((ID *)mtex_ar[slot]->tex);
00816         MEM_freeN(mtex_ar[slot]);
00817         mtex_ar[slot]= NULL;
00818     }
00819 
00820     mtex_ar[slot]= add_mtex();
00821 
00822     return mtex_ar[slot];
00823 }
00824 
00825 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00826 
00827 Tex *copy_texture(Tex *tex)
00828 {
00829     Tex *texn;
00830     
00831     texn= copy_libblock(&tex->id);
00832     if (texn->type==TEX_IMAGE) id_us_plus((ID *)texn->ima);
00833     else texn->ima= NULL;
00834     
00835     if (texn->plugin) {
00836         texn->plugin= MEM_dupallocN(texn->plugin);
00837         open_plugin_tex(texn->plugin);
00838     }
00839     
00840     if (texn->coba) texn->coba= MEM_dupallocN(texn->coba);
00841     if (texn->env) texn->env= BKE_copy_envmap(texn->env);
00842     if (texn->pd) texn->pd= BKE_copy_pointdensity(texn->pd);
00843     if (texn->vd) texn->vd= MEM_dupallocN(texn->vd);
00844     if (texn->ot) texn->ot= BKE_copy_oceantex(texn->ot);
00845     if (tex->preview) texn->preview = BKE_previewimg_copy(tex->preview);
00846 
00847     if (tex->nodetree) {
00848         if (tex->nodetree->execdata) {
00849             ntreeTexEndExecTree(tex->nodetree->execdata, 1);
00850         }
00851         texn->nodetree= ntreeCopyTree(tex->nodetree); 
00852     }
00853     
00854     return texn;
00855 }
00856 
00857 /* texture copy without adding to main dbase */
00858 Tex *localize_texture(Tex *tex)
00859 {
00860     Tex *texn;
00861     
00862     texn= copy_libblock(&tex->id);
00863     BLI_remlink(&G.main->tex, texn);
00864     
00865     /* image texture: free_texture also doesn't decrease */
00866     
00867     if (texn->plugin) {
00868         texn->plugin= MEM_dupallocN(texn->plugin);
00869         open_plugin_tex(texn->plugin);
00870     }
00871     
00872     if (texn->coba) texn->coba= MEM_dupallocN(texn->coba);
00873     if (texn->env) {
00874         texn->env= BKE_copy_envmap(texn->env);
00875         id_us_min(&texn->env->ima->id);
00876     }
00877     if (texn->pd) texn->pd= BKE_copy_pointdensity(texn->pd);
00878     if (texn->vd) {
00879         texn->vd= MEM_dupallocN(texn->vd);
00880         if (texn->vd->dataset)
00881             texn->vd->dataset= MEM_dupallocN(texn->vd->dataset);
00882     }
00883     if (texn->ot) {
00884         texn->ot= BKE_copy_oceantex(tex->ot);
00885     }
00886     
00887     texn->preview = NULL;
00888     
00889     if (tex->nodetree) {
00890         texn->nodetree= ntreeLocalize(tex->nodetree);
00891     }
00892     
00893     return texn;
00894 }
00895 
00896 
00897 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00898 
00899 static void extern_local_texture(Tex *tex)
00900 {
00901     id_lib_extern((ID *)tex->ima);
00902 }
00903 
00904 void make_local_texture(Tex *tex)
00905 {
00906     Main *bmain= G.main;
00907     Material *ma;
00908     World *wrld;
00909     Lamp *la;
00910     Brush *br;
00911     ParticleSettings *pa;
00912     int a, is_local= FALSE, is_lib= FALSE;
00913 
00914     /* - only lib users: do nothing
00915      * - only local users: set flag
00916      * - mixed: make copy
00917      */
00918     
00919     if (tex->id.lib==NULL) return;
00920 
00921     if (tex->id.us==1) {
00922         id_clear_lib_data(bmain, &tex->id);
00923         extern_local_texture(tex);
00924         return;
00925     }
00926     
00927     ma= bmain->mat.first;
00928     while (ma) {
00929         for (a=0; a<MAX_MTEX; a++) {
00930             if (ma->mtex[a] && ma->mtex[a]->tex==tex) {
00931                 if (ma->id.lib) is_lib= TRUE;
00932                 else is_local= TRUE;
00933             }
00934         }
00935         ma= ma->id.next;
00936     }
00937     la= bmain->lamp.first;
00938     while (la) {
00939         for (a=0; a<MAX_MTEX; a++) {
00940             if (la->mtex[a] && la->mtex[a]->tex==tex) {
00941                 if (la->id.lib) is_lib= TRUE;
00942                 else is_local= TRUE;
00943             }
00944         }
00945         la= la->id.next;
00946     }
00947     wrld= bmain->world.first;
00948     while (wrld) {
00949         for (a=0; a<MAX_MTEX; a++) {
00950             if (wrld->mtex[a] && wrld->mtex[a]->tex==tex) {
00951                 if (wrld->id.lib) is_lib= TRUE;
00952                 else is_local= TRUE;
00953             }
00954         }
00955         wrld= wrld->id.next;
00956     }
00957     br= bmain->brush.first;
00958     while (br) {
00959         if (br->mtex.tex==tex) {
00960             if (br->id.lib) is_lib= TRUE;
00961             else is_local= TRUE;
00962         }
00963         br= br->id.next;
00964     }
00965     pa= bmain->particle.first;
00966     while (pa) {
00967         for (a=0; a<MAX_MTEX; a++) {
00968             if (pa->mtex[a] && pa->mtex[a]->tex==tex) {
00969                 if (pa->id.lib) is_lib= TRUE;
00970                 else is_local= TRUE;
00971             }
00972         }
00973         pa= pa->id.next;
00974     }
00975     
00976     if (is_local && is_lib == FALSE) {
00977         id_clear_lib_data(bmain, &tex->id);
00978         extern_local_texture(tex);
00979     }
00980     else if (is_local && is_lib) {
00981         Tex *tex_new= copy_texture(tex);
00982 
00983         tex_new->id.us= 0;
00984 
00985         /* Remap paths of new ID using old library as base. */
00986         BKE_id_lib_local_paths(bmain, tex->id.lib, &tex_new->id);
00987         
00988         ma= bmain->mat.first;
00989         while (ma) {
00990             for (a=0; a<MAX_MTEX; a++) {
00991                 if (ma->mtex[a] && ma->mtex[a]->tex==tex) {
00992                     if (ma->id.lib==NULL) {
00993                         ma->mtex[a]->tex= tex_new;
00994                         tex_new->id.us++;
00995                         tex->id.us--;
00996                     }
00997                 }
00998             }
00999             ma= ma->id.next;
01000         }
01001         la= bmain->lamp.first;
01002         while (la) {
01003             for (a=0; a<MAX_MTEX; a++) {
01004                 if (la->mtex[a] && la->mtex[a]->tex==tex) {
01005                     if (la->id.lib==NULL) {
01006                         la->mtex[a]->tex= tex_new;
01007                         tex_new->id.us++;
01008                         tex->id.us--;
01009                     }
01010                 }
01011             }
01012             la= la->id.next;
01013         }
01014         wrld= bmain->world.first;
01015         while (wrld) {
01016             for (a=0; a<MAX_MTEX; a++) {
01017                 if (wrld->mtex[a] && wrld->mtex[a]->tex==tex) {
01018                     if (wrld->id.lib==NULL) {
01019                         wrld->mtex[a]->tex= tex_new;
01020                         tex_new->id.us++;
01021                         tex->id.us--;
01022                     }
01023                 }
01024             }
01025             wrld= wrld->id.next;
01026         }
01027         br= bmain->brush.first;
01028         while (br) {
01029             if (br->mtex.tex==tex) {
01030                 if (br->id.lib==NULL) {
01031                     br->mtex.tex= tex_new;
01032                     tex_new->id.us++;
01033                     tex->id.us--;
01034                 }
01035             }
01036             br= br->id.next;
01037         }
01038         pa= bmain->particle.first;
01039         while (pa) {
01040             for (a=0; a<MAX_MTEX; a++) {
01041                 if (pa->mtex[a] && pa->mtex[a]->tex==tex) {
01042                     if (pa->id.lib==NULL) {
01043                         pa->mtex[a]->tex= tex_new;
01044                         tex_new->id.us++;
01045                         tex->id.us--;
01046                     }
01047                 }
01048             }
01049             pa= pa->id.next;
01050         }
01051     }
01052 }
01053 
01054 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
01055 #if 0 /* UNUSED */
01056 void autotexname(Tex *tex)
01057 {
01058     Main *bmain= G.main;
01059     char texstr[20][15]= {"None"  , "Clouds" , "Wood", "Marble", "Magic"  , "Blend",
01060         "Stucci", "Noise"  , "Image", "Plugin", "EnvMap" , "Musgrave",
01061         "Voronoi", "DistNoise", "Point Density", "Voxel Data", "Ocean", "", "", ""};
01062     Image *ima;
01063     char di[FILE_MAXDIR], fi[FILE_MAXFILE];
01064     
01065     if (tex) {
01066         if (tex->use_nodes) {
01067             new_id(&bmain->tex, (ID *)tex, "Noddy");
01068         }
01069         else
01070         if (tex->type==TEX_IMAGE) {
01071             ima= tex->ima;
01072             if (ima) {
01073                 BLI_strncpy(di, ima->name, sizeof(di));
01074                 BLI_splitdirstring(di, fi);
01075                 strcpy(di, "I.");
01076                 strcat(di, fi);
01077                 new_id(&bmain->tex, (ID *)tex, di);
01078             }
01079             else new_id(&bmain->tex, (ID *)tex, texstr[tex->type]);
01080         }
01081         else if (tex->type==TEX_PLUGIN && tex->plugin) new_id(&bmain->tex, (ID *)tex, tex->plugin->pname);
01082         else new_id(&bmain->tex, (ID *)tex, texstr[tex->type]);
01083     }
01084 }
01085 #endif
01086 
01087 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
01088 
01089 Tex *give_current_object_texture(Object *ob)
01090 {
01091     Material *ma, *node_ma;
01092     Tex *tex= NULL;
01093     
01094     if (ob==NULL) return NULL;
01095     if (ob->totcol==0 && !(ob->type==OB_LAMP)) return NULL;
01096     
01097     if (ob->type==OB_LAMP) {
01098         tex= give_current_lamp_texture(ob->data);
01099     }
01100     else {
01101         ma= give_current_material(ob, ob->actcol);
01102 
01103         if ((node_ma=give_node_material(ma)))
01104             ma= node_ma;
01105 
01106         tex= give_current_material_texture(ma);
01107     }
01108     
01109     return tex;
01110 }
01111 
01112 Tex *give_current_lamp_texture(Lamp *la)
01113 {
01114     MTex *mtex= NULL;
01115     Tex *tex= NULL;
01116 
01117     if (la) {
01118         mtex= la->mtex[(int)(la->texact)];
01119         if (mtex) tex= mtex->tex;
01120     }
01121 
01122     return tex;
01123 }
01124 
01125 void set_current_lamp_texture(Lamp *la, Tex *newtex)
01126 {
01127     int act= la->texact;
01128 
01129     if (la->mtex[act] && la->mtex[act]->tex)
01130         id_us_min(&la->mtex[act]->tex->id);
01131 
01132     if (newtex) {
01133         if (!la->mtex[act]) {
01134             la->mtex[act]= add_mtex();
01135             la->mtex[act]->texco= TEXCO_GLOB;
01136         }
01137         
01138         la->mtex[act]->tex= newtex;
01139         id_us_plus(&newtex->id);
01140     }
01141     else if (la->mtex[act]) {
01142         MEM_freeN(la->mtex[act]);
01143         la->mtex[act]= NULL;
01144     }
01145 }
01146 
01147 bNode *give_current_material_texture_node(Material *ma)
01148 {
01149     if (ma && ma->use_nodes && ma->nodetree)
01150         return nodeGetActiveID(ma->nodetree, ID_TE);
01151     
01152     return NULL;
01153 }
01154 
01155 Tex *give_current_material_texture(Material *ma)
01156 {
01157     MTex *mtex= NULL;
01158     Tex *tex= NULL;
01159     bNode *node;
01160     
01161     if (ma && ma->use_nodes && ma->nodetree) {
01162         /* first check texture, then material, this works together
01163          * with a hack that clears the active ID flag for textures on
01164          * making a material node active */
01165         node= nodeGetActiveID(ma->nodetree, ID_TE);
01166 
01167         if (node) {
01168             tex= (Tex *)node->id;
01169             ma= NULL;
01170         }
01171     }
01172 
01173     if (ma) {
01174         mtex= ma->mtex[(int)(ma->texact)];
01175         if (mtex) tex= mtex->tex;
01176     }
01177     
01178     return tex;
01179 }
01180 
01181 int give_active_mtex(ID *id, MTex ***mtex_ar, short *act)
01182 {
01183     switch(GS(id->name)) {
01184     case ID_MA:
01185         *mtex_ar=       ((Material *)id)->mtex;
01186         if (act) *act=  (((Material *)id)->texact);
01187         break;
01188     case ID_WO:
01189         *mtex_ar=       ((World *)id)->mtex;
01190         if (act) *act=  (((World *)id)->texact);
01191         break;
01192     case ID_LA:
01193         *mtex_ar=       ((Lamp *)id)->mtex;
01194         if (act) *act=  (((Lamp *)id)->texact);
01195         break;
01196     case ID_PA:
01197         *mtex_ar=       ((ParticleSettings *)id)->mtex;
01198         if (act) *act=  (((ParticleSettings *)id)->texact);
01199         break;
01200     default:
01201         *mtex_ar = NULL;
01202         if (act) *act=  0;
01203         return FALSE;
01204     }
01205 
01206     return TRUE;
01207 }
01208 
01209 void set_active_mtex(ID *id, short act)
01210 {
01211     if (act<0)              act= 0;
01212     else if (act>=MAX_MTEX) act= MAX_MTEX-1;
01213 
01214     switch(GS(id->name)) {
01215     case ID_MA:
01216         ((Material *)id)->texact= act;
01217         break;
01218     case ID_WO:
01219         ((World *)id)->texact= act;
01220         break;
01221     case ID_LA:
01222         ((Lamp *)id)->texact= act;
01223         break;
01224     case ID_PA:
01225         ((ParticleSettings *)id)->texact= act;
01226         break;
01227     }
01228 }
01229 
01230 void set_current_material_texture(Material *ma, Tex *newtex)
01231 {
01232     Tex *tex= NULL;
01233     bNode *node;
01234     
01235     if (ma && ma->use_nodes && ma->nodetree) {
01236         node= nodeGetActiveID(ma->nodetree, ID_TE);
01237 
01238         if (node) {
01239             tex= (Tex *)node->id;
01240             id_us_min(&tex->id);
01241             node->id= &newtex->id;
01242             id_us_plus(&newtex->id);
01243             ma= NULL;
01244         }
01245     }
01246     if (ma) {
01247         int act= (int)ma->texact;
01248 
01249         tex= (ma->mtex[act])? ma->mtex[act]->tex: NULL;
01250         id_us_min(&tex->id);
01251 
01252         if (newtex) {
01253             if (!ma->mtex[act])
01254                 ma->mtex[act]= add_mtex();
01255             
01256             ma->mtex[act]->tex= newtex;
01257             id_us_plus(&newtex->id);
01258         }
01259         else if (ma->mtex[act]) {
01260             MEM_freeN(ma->mtex[act]);
01261             ma->mtex[act]= NULL;
01262         }
01263     }
01264 }
01265 
01266 int has_current_material_texture(Material *ma)
01267 {
01268     bNode *node;
01269 
01270     if (ma && ma->use_nodes && ma->nodetree) {
01271         node= nodeGetActiveID(ma->nodetree, ID_TE);
01272 
01273         if (node)
01274             return 1;
01275     }
01276 
01277     return (ma != NULL);
01278 }
01279 
01280 Tex *give_current_world_texture(World *world)
01281 {
01282     MTex *mtex= NULL;
01283     Tex *tex= NULL;
01284     
01285     if (!world) return NULL;
01286     
01287     mtex= world->mtex[(int)(world->texact)];
01288     if (mtex) tex= mtex->tex;
01289     
01290     return tex;
01291 }
01292 
01293 void set_current_world_texture(World *wo, Tex *newtex)
01294 {
01295     int act= wo->texact;
01296 
01297     if (wo->mtex[act] && wo->mtex[act]->tex)
01298         id_us_min(&wo->mtex[act]->tex->id);
01299 
01300     if (newtex) {
01301         if (!wo->mtex[act]) {
01302             wo->mtex[act]= add_mtex();
01303             wo->mtex[act]->texco= TEXCO_VIEW;
01304         }
01305         
01306         wo->mtex[act]->tex= newtex;
01307         id_us_plus(&newtex->id);
01308     }
01309     else if (wo->mtex[act]) {
01310         MEM_freeN(wo->mtex[act]);
01311         wo->mtex[act]= NULL;
01312     }
01313 }
01314 
01315 Tex *give_current_brush_texture(Brush *br)
01316 {
01317     return br->mtex.tex;
01318 }
01319 
01320 void set_current_brush_texture(Brush *br, Tex *newtex)
01321 {
01322     if (br->mtex.tex)
01323         id_us_min(&br->mtex.tex->id);
01324 
01325     if (newtex) {
01326         br->mtex.tex= newtex;
01327         id_us_plus(&newtex->id);
01328     }
01329 }
01330 
01331 Tex *give_current_particle_texture(ParticleSettings *part)
01332 {
01333     MTex *mtex= NULL;
01334     Tex *tex= NULL;
01335     
01336     if (!part) return NULL;
01337     
01338     mtex= part->mtex[(int)(part->texact)];
01339     if (mtex) tex= mtex->tex;
01340     
01341     return tex;
01342 }
01343 
01344 void set_current_particle_texture(ParticleSettings *part, Tex *newtex)
01345 {
01346     int act= part->texact;
01347 
01348     if (part->mtex[act] && part->mtex[act]->tex)
01349         id_us_min(&part->mtex[act]->tex->id);
01350 
01351     if (newtex) {
01352         if (!part->mtex[act]) {
01353             part->mtex[act]= add_mtex();
01354             part->mtex[act]->texco= TEXCO_ORCO;
01355             part->mtex[act]->blendtype= MTEX_MUL;
01356         }
01357         
01358         part->mtex[act]->tex= newtex;
01359         id_us_plus(&newtex->id);
01360     }
01361     else if (part->mtex[act]) {
01362         MEM_freeN(part->mtex[act]);
01363         part->mtex[act]= NULL;
01364     }
01365 }
01366

01369 EnvMap *BKE_add_envmap(void)
01370 {
01371     EnvMap *env;
01372     
01373     env= MEM_callocN(sizeof(EnvMap), "envmap");
01374     env->type= ENV_CUBE;
01375     env->stype= ENV_ANIM;
01376     env->clipsta= 0.1;
01377     env->clipend= 100.0;
01378     env->cuberes= 600;
01379     env->viewscale = 0.5;
01380     
01381     return env;
01382 } 
01383 
01384 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
01385 
01386 EnvMap *BKE_copy_envmap(EnvMap *env)
01387 {
01388     EnvMap *envn;
01389     int a;
01390     
01391     envn= MEM_dupallocN(env);
01392     envn->ok= 0;
01393     for (a=0; a<6; a++) envn->cube[a]= NULL;
01394     if (envn->ima) id_us_plus((ID *)envn->ima);
01395     
01396     return envn;
01397 }
01398 
01399 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
01400 
01401 void BKE_free_envmapdata(EnvMap *env)
01402 {
01403     unsigned int part;
01404     
01405     for (part=0; part<6; part++) {
01406         if (env->cube[part])
01407             IMB_freeImBuf(env->cube[part]);
01408         env->cube[part]= NULL;
01409     }
01410     env->ok= 0;
01411 }
01412 
01413 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
01414 
01415 void BKE_free_envmap(EnvMap *env)
01416 {
01417     
01418     BKE_free_envmapdata(env);
01419     MEM_freeN(env);
01420     
01421 }

01424 
01425 PointDensity *BKE_add_pointdensity(void)
01426 {
01427     PointDensity *pd;
01428     
01429     pd= MEM_callocN(sizeof(PointDensity), "pointdensity");
01430     pd->flag = 0;
01431     pd->radius = 0.3f;
01432     pd->falloff_type = TEX_PD_FALLOFF_STD;
01433     pd->falloff_softness = 2.0;
01434     pd->source = TEX_PD_PSYS;
01435     pd->point_tree = NULL;
01436     pd->point_data = NULL;
01437     pd->noise_size = 0.5f;
01438     pd->noise_depth = 1;
01439     pd->noise_fac = 1.0f;
01440     pd->noise_influence = TEX_PD_NOISE_STATIC;
01441     pd->coba = add_colorband(1);
01442     pd->speed_scale = 1.0f;
01443     pd->totpoints = 0;
01444     pd->object = NULL;
01445     pd->psys = 0;
01446     pd->psys_cache_space= TEX_PD_WORLDSPACE;
01447     pd->falloff_curve = curvemapping_add(1, 0, 0, 1, 1);
01448 
01449     pd->falloff_curve->preset = CURVE_PRESET_LINE;
01450     pd->falloff_curve->cm->flag &= ~CUMA_EXTEND_EXTRAPOLATE;
01451     curvemap_reset(pd->falloff_curve->cm, &pd->falloff_curve->clipr, pd->falloff_curve->preset, CURVEMAP_SLOPE_POSITIVE);
01452     curvemapping_changed(pd->falloff_curve, 0);
01453 
01454     return pd;
01455 } 
01456 
01457 PointDensity *BKE_copy_pointdensity(PointDensity *pd)
01458 {
01459     PointDensity *pdn;
01460 
01461     pdn= MEM_dupallocN(pd);
01462     pdn->point_tree = NULL;
01463     pdn->point_data = NULL;
01464     if (pdn->coba) pdn->coba= MEM_dupallocN(pdn->coba);
01465     pdn->falloff_curve = curvemapping_copy(pdn->falloff_curve); /* can be NULL */
01466     return pdn;
01467 }
01468 
01469 void BKE_free_pointdensitydata(PointDensity *pd)
01470 {
01471     if (pd->point_tree) {
01472         BLI_bvhtree_free(pd->point_tree);
01473         pd->point_tree = NULL;
01474     }
01475     if (pd->point_data) {
01476         MEM_freeN(pd->point_data);
01477         pd->point_data = NULL;
01478     }
01479     if (pd->coba) {
01480         MEM_freeN(pd->coba);
01481         pd->coba = NULL;
01482     }
01483 
01484     curvemapping_free(pd->falloff_curve); /* can be NULL */
01485 }
01486 
01487 void BKE_free_pointdensity(PointDensity *pd)
01488 {
01489     BKE_free_pointdensitydata(pd);
01490     MEM_freeN(pd);
01491 }

01502 }

01505 {

01507     MEM_freeN(vd);
01508 }

01510 struct VoxelData *BKE_add_voxeldata(void)
01511 {
01512     VoxelData *vd;
01513 
01514     vd= MEM_callocN(sizeof(struct VoxelData), "voxeldata");
01515     vd->dataset = NULL;
01516     vd->resol[0] = vd->resol[1] = vd->resol[2] = 1;
01517     vd->interp_type= TEX_VD_LINEAR;
01518     vd->file_format= TEX_VD_SMOKE;
01519     vd->int_multiplier = 1.0;
01520     vd->extend = TEX_CLIP;
01521     vd->object = NULL;
01522     vd->cachedframe = -1;
01523     vd->ok = 0;
01524     
01525     return vd;
01526  }
01527

01529 {
01530     VoxelData *vdn;
01531 
01532     vdn= MEM_dupallocN(vd); 
01533     vdn->dataset = NULL;
01534 
01535     return vdn;
01536 }

01563 
01564 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
01565 int BKE_texture_dependsOnTime(const struct Tex *texture)
01566 {
01567     if (texture->plugin) {
01568         // assume all plugins depend on time
01569         return 1;
01570     } 
01571     else if (   texture->ima && 
01572             ELEM(texture->ima->source, IMA_SRC_SEQUENCE, IMA_SRC_MOVIE)) {
01573         return 1;
01574     }
01575     else if (texture->adt) {
01576         // assume anything in adt means the texture is animated
01577         return 1;
01578     }
01579     else if (texture->type == TEX_NOISE) {
01580         // noise always varies with time
01581         return 1;
01582     }
01583     return 0;
01584 }
